entries.title: Don't worry, Quordle is not going behind a paywall, says Merriam-Webster
entries.description: Your favorite online dictionary is now home to one of the more popular online word games, that's not Wordle

entries.title: LG’s smart projector is the square cousin of Samsung’s cool The Freestyle
entries.description: Portable projectors are being used more than ever for entertainment, and with its new compact offering LG is getting in on the game.

entries.title: Wi-Fi routers are being hit by a dangerous new Android malware with extra DNS hacks
entries.description: With the DNS changed, victims are redirected to malicious pages where their login credentials might get stolen.

entries.title: Hostinger quietly shutters Zyro to focus on Hostinger Website Builder service
entries.description: Hostinger pushes resources into its website builder, which could spell the end for its Zyro subsidiary.

entries.title: Avatar 2 animators tricked James Cameron into believing some shots were practical
entries.description: Daniel Barrett, Senior Animation Supervisor at Weta FX, explains how he and his team tricked Avatar: The Way of Water director James Cameron.

entries.title: Deadpool joins Marvel's Midnight Suns next week, adding new story missions
entries.description: Marvel’s Midnight Suns’ first DLC pack has a release date and a new trailer.

entries.title: Ex-Halo dev believes those who pushed for a better game ‘got laid off for it’
entries.description: An ex-Halo developer has criticized Microsoft’s decision to lay off over 10,000 employees, including staff from Halo Infinite developer 343 Industries.

entries.title: Nintendo is reportedly increasing Switch production ahead of Breath of the Wild 2
entries.description: Nintendo is reportedly gearing up to increase Switch production, following a slump last year.

entries.title: A nuclear-powered data center is opening this year
entries.description: With data centers under intense scrutiny for their energy usage, nuclear-power could be the answer.

entries.title: There are two clear winners in the PSVR 2 launch lineup
entries.description: Sony announces over a dozen new titles set to release alongside the PSVR2.

entries.title: Blizzard games to pull the plug in China
entries.description: From January 23, gamers will need to use the best China VPNs to keep playing the likes of World of Warcraft and Hearthstone.

entries.title: Invincible season 2 trailer is the perfect birthday gift for Mark Grayson
entries.description: After a near two-year wait, Invincible season 2 has received its first trailer – and a launch window.

entries.title: Now Google is axing jobs - 12,000 of them
entries.description: Email from CEO states that focus on new priorities is needed, like AI.

entries.title: Zoom is going to work a lot closer with one of its biggest rivals, and I couldn't be happier
entries.description: Zoom and Google Meet interoperability features could be a game-changer for many.

entries.title: Millions of T-Mobile customers have data stolen in breach
entries.description: T-Mobile said "basic" customer data was taken, but payment details remain secure.

entries.title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (January 20)
entries.description: From nineties comedy revivals to post-apocalyptic sci-fi thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

entries.title: MacBook Air 2023 could be faster and sleeker with new M3 chip
entries.description: Is this a hint that a MacBook Air 15-inch is being readied for later this year, to be powered with new M3 silicon?

entries.title: Valve Index 2: rumors, predictions and what we want from the VR headset
entries.description: Here’s a rundown of everything we currently know about the Valve Index 2 and what we want to see from the VR device.

entries.title: You can now get ChatGPT on a Linux desktop
entries.description: Developer creates extension to use ChatGPT straight from your Linux desktop.

entries.title: Oculus Quest 3: everything we know so far
entries.description: We break down everything we know about the Oculus Quest 3, from its expected features to potential price.

entries.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra: latest rumors and everything we know so far
entries.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra is landing soon and it's been extensively leaked. Here's what we know so far.

entries.title: PayPal confirms data breach, sends warning emails to users
entries.description: Thousands of PayPal users affected in what appears to be a credential stuffing attack.

entries.title: Spotify could soon match Amazon Music Unlimited's untimely price hike
entries.description: Amazon Music Unlimited has bumped up its monthly fee – and that only makes the rumored Spotify rise more likely.

entries.title: End of an era: Microsoft will soon stop selling Windows 10 licences
entries.description: Microsoft to end online sale of Windows 10 – but don’t panic if you’re still on an older OS.

entries.title: I really hope this Nvidia RTX 4060 Ti GPU performance rumor is fake
entries.description: The latest rumor is a difficult one to swallow, and speculation around the price being relatively lofty is worrying, too.

entries.title: Ransomware is getting less lucrative as victims stop paying
entries.description: Victims increasingly refused to pay ransoms in 2022, but crooks still got away with hundreds of millions.

entries.title: Parents are becoming increasingly concerned over online safety for kids
entries.description: Mozilla finds a variety of concerns amongst parents for their children's online safety.

entries.title: This Microsoft Outlook update might finally stop people bugging you for a meeting
entries.description: New "bookable time" Outlook feature should make scheduling a whole lot easier.

entries.title: The OnePlus 11 might be a worse phone in the US than elsewhere
entries.description: US models of the OnePlus 11 will reportedly charge slower than elsewhere, much like with the OnePlus 10 Pro.

entries.title: Netflix sets deadline for its crackdown on password sharing
entries.description: The streaming giant is ramping up plans to stop you from sharing your Netflix account with others.
